info:
is a professional actor based in Lagos, Nigeria, known for his ability to bring characters to life through his dynamic use of voice, body, actions, and reactions. Taye has a robust portfolio of work in TV, film, and stage productions. He has appeared in notable TV shows such as "Castle & Castle" on Ebonylife TV, where he played a pathologist.

Taye Arimoro was lead actor in Niyi Akinmolayan's "Casa De Novia" on Prime Video, "The House of Secrets", Clarence Peters "Inside Life" on Netflix, Inkblot's latest Nigerian football film "When Love Strikes", Anthill's "Criminal" streaming on Prime Video, "Last Year Single" now streaming on Netflix, Russet TV's "There's Something Wrong with the Bamideles", "Son of the Soil" a Nigerian-UK action thriller directed by Chee Keong (a UK-Chinese director). Taye Arimoro has also been in various television shows including Africa Magic's
"Venge", James Omokwe's "Ajoche" and "The Decision," an adaptation of Cinderella.
perks: project to gain marketing support from boxonia blueprint

info:
has become a fan favorite in the Nollywood space and
beyond, admired for his charming, witty, smart, and confident
personality. To hone his craft as a professional actor, he trained at
renowned film institutes, including EbonyLife Creative Academy, Royal
Arts Academy, and the African International Film Festival (AFRIFF)
acting masterclass. Currently based in Lagos, Chuks is an accomplished
actor and model with a strong presence in the entertainment industry.

Standing 5’9” with an athletic build, Chuks has appeared in numerous
blockbuster films (both in cinemas and on streaming platforms), TV
shows, music videos, commercials, and fashion shows. His notable works include Dark October, The Origin: Madam Koi-Koi, and Afamefuna on Netflix, Criminal on Prime Video,  Leaked and Kokomma on
YouTube. He also starred in When Love Strikes, Nigeria’s latest football-
themed film. On television, Chuks has featured in series such as
Masquerades of Aniedo, Schooled, Nwanyi Ike, Riona, Baby Drama, and
Flatmates.

As a model, Chuks was the first runner-up in the 2020 Mr. Ideal Nigeria
competition, earning the title of Mr. Ideal Nigeria Earth. He has since
been featured in music videos, commercials, and fashion shoots,
showcasing his versatility and presence in the modeling world.
perks: Project to Gain Marketing Support from Boxonia Blueprint

info:
is a talented actor celebrated for his versatility in stage plays, feature-length films, and short movies. A graduate of EbonyLife Creative Academy, he has honed his craft through formal training and practical experience. Beyond acting, Oluwadurotimi has also directed personal projects and stage plays, highlighting his multifaceted skills in theater and film.

His notable acting credits include roles in the upcoming film Everything Scatter directed by Jade Osiberu, Son of the Soil (2024), a Nigerian-UK action thriller by UK-Chinese director Chee Keong, and The Bride Price under Sunom Kura George’s direction. He also stars as James in Mirrors: James’ Split by Arnold Mafo and appeared in Naija Saga (2022) directed by Akinyemi Tag. On stage, Oluwadurotimi delivered compelling performances as Olunde in Death and the King’s Horseman (2022) and as the Second Chief in The Gods Are Not to Blame (2022), both directed by Ayo Ajisafe.
In addition to acting, Oluwadurotimi has contributed to projects like the short film Ebiren Re (2024) as Godfrey Williams, directed by Yinka Otubusin, and the TV series Cheta’m (2023) as crew/Apoputara, directed by James Omokwe. With a passion for storytelling and an unwavering dedication to his craft, Oluwadurotimi continues to leave a mark on the entertainment industry.

is a promising young actress steadily making her mark in the film industry. She made her on-screen debut in 2019 with Boxonia’s short film Otana and has since shown unwavering determination to establish herself as a notable talent.

In 2023, Victory starred in the Nollywood blockbuster Bank Alert, sharing the screen with industry icons like Okey Bakassi, Kanayo O. Kanayo, Kate Henshaw, Taiwo Hassan, and Bolanle Ninolowo. Her passion for acting, coupled with a deep understanding of her craft, positions her as a rising star and a strong contender among her peers.

,known as Miss Ezeani, is a multitalented creative and versatile actress known for her enthralling one-woman productions. To further enhance her acting skills,  she attended the prestigious Ebonylife Creative Academy to help kickstart her career as an actor. 


Ezeani has showcased her talent in various notable projects, including James Omokwe's Chetana (Showmax, 2023) Enclosed (2024),
Uriri (African Magic Showcase, 2024),  A Trio's Tale (2024), 
Kokumo (2024), an Ebonylife Creative Academy project. 

With several exciting projects in the pipeline, including Omoni Oboli's Cupcakes for Val. Beyond acting, she's a successful influencer, collaborating with top brands like Bolt, TikTok, Itel, Jumia amongst others.

 Miss Ezeani’s impressive range of characters has garnered significant attention online and has made her an internet sensation. She is undoubtedly one to look out for in the entertainment industry.
bisola ayeola is an award-winning actress, host, and singer. her comedic timing and ability to switch roles across genres make her a sought-after talent.
kunle remi is known for action thrillers and romantic films. he has worked with top production houses in nigeria and beyond.
uche jumbo is a writer, producer, and actress with decades of experience in nollywood. she is known for championing women's stories and powerful performances.
falz is a rapper, actor, and comedian whose unique blend of humor and social commentary makes him one of nigeria's most dynamic entertainers.
rita edochie is a seasoned actress with a flair for dramatic mother roles. she is revered in the industry for her consistency and emotional delivery.
